statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
You have got a cylindrical cup. Its bottom diameter is 2 units and its height is 2 units as well.
The height of liquid level in the cup is d (0 �� d �� 2). When you incline the cup to the maximal angle such that the liquid inside has not been poured out, what is the area of the surface of the liquid?

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The first line is the number of test cases. For each test case, a line contains a float-point number d.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, output a line containing the area of the surface rounded to 5 decimal places.
